skills.name: Fair Strike
skills.description: Deals extra damage against summoned units
skills.tips: Perfect counter to Nature summon-heavy teams

skills.name: Divine Descent
skills.description: Increases ATK and damage reduction, grants AOE normal attacks temporarily
skills.tips: Transforms Bishop into AOE powerhouse - massive damage spike

skills.name: Solar Shield
skills.description: Increases crit rate and crit resistance
skills.tips: Offensive and defensive crit stats - versatile passive

skills.name: Confession
skills.description: Deals damage, applies Weaken debuff, extra effective vs summons
skills.tips: Anti-summon specialist - shuts down Nature strategies

skills.name: Sacred Burst
skills.description: Triggers AOE damage automatically when enemies die
skills.tips: Snowball mechanic - gets stronger as enemies fall

skills.name: War Messenger
skills.description: Increases soldiers' attack per 1000 deployed
skills.tips: Army damage boost for campaign and guild content

skills.name: Mountain Strike
skills.description: Deals damage, increases max HP, and grants damage immunity
skills.tips: Use to engage enemies and boost survivability during critical moments

skills.name: Ultimate Zen Power
skills.description: Grants dodge, damage reduction, and counterattacks when hit
skills.tips: Powerful defensive ultimate that turns incoming damage into counterattacks

skills.name: Thundering Kick
skills.description: Adds a chance to follow up Mountain Strike with a stun
skills.tips: Provides additional crowd control to lock down priority targets

skills.name: Fiery Breath
skills.description: Deals damage and grants control immunity
skills.tips: Use to break free from CC and continue dealing damage

skills.name: Merciful Victor
skills.description: Gains a shield when units die or are sacrificed
skills.tips: Synergizes with summon-heavy comps for constant shield uptime

skills.name: Guardian Messenger
skills.description: Increases soldier HP per 1000 deployed
skills.tips: Makes your army tankier - crucial for campaign and guild events

skills.name: Commanding Call
skills.description: Deals rectangular AOE damage and grants allies shield
skills.tips: Primary damage dealer for League - highest DPS in faction

skills.name: Celestial Blade
skills.description: Grants control immunity, deals massive AOE damage, applies burn stacks, and gains damage reduction
skills.tips: Game-changing ultimate. Position Paragon to hit maximum enemies

skills.name: Final Verdict
skills.description: Increases damage against enemies above 70% HP. Reduces ultimate cooldown by 2s per enemy defeated
skills.tips: Makes Paragon excellent at burst damage and ability cycling

skills.name: Moral Fury
skills.description: Waves flag to increase all allies' attack and deals damage per second
skills.tips: Team-wide damage buff - critical for sustained fights

skills.name: Ultimate Execution
skills.description: Extends normal attack range, adds additional target, and boosts normal attack damage
skills.tips: Significantly increases sustained DPS between skill rotations

skills.name: Conqueror
skills.description: Boosts castle attack per Legendary+ hero; grants skill crit at 6 heroes
skills.tips: Scales with team quality - becomes stronger as you build more Legendaries

skills.name: Be Brave
skills.description: Gains Courage stacks providing damage reduction; damage taken converts to Resentment
skills.tips: Core tanking mechanic - stores damage taken as resource for counterattack

skills.name: Bloom
skills.description: Consumes Resentment stacks to deal massive damage and apply Heal Ban
skills.tips: Convert tanked damage into burst - timing is critical

skills.name: Thorns
skills.description: Damage scales with accumulated Resentment stacks
skills.tips: More damage taken = more damage dealt back

skills.name: Weapon Up!
skills.description: Damage reduction scales with ATK stat
skills.tips: Unique mechanic - offensive stats make her tankier

skills.name: Roses
skills.description: Gains Courage and HP when enemies die
skills.tips: Gets stronger as fight progresses and enemies fall

skills.name: Guardian Messenger
skills.description: Increases soldiers' HP per 1000 deployed
skills.tips: Makes your army more resilient in campaign

skills.name: Whirlwind Feathers
skills.description: Deals damage, later upgrades also increase movement and attack speed
skills.tips: Core damage ability with speed scaling

skills.name: Lightning Storm
skills.description: Deals massive damage and launches enemies into the air
skills.tips: High burst AOE with CC - excellent for team fights

skills.name: Wings of Freedom
skills.description: Was previously called 'Wind of Freedom' - grants dodge to all heroes in queue
skills.tips: Team-wide evasion buff - counters auto-attack heavy comps

skills.name: Tornado
skills.description: Channels whirlwind that blocks projectiles, then deals damage
skills.tips: Defensive tool that transitions into offense

skills.name: Wind Field
skills.description: Each Tornado cast permanently increases team attack
skills.tips: Stacking damage buff - gets stronger throughout the fight

skills.name: War Messenger
skills.description: Increases soldier attack per 1000 soldiers deployed
skills.tips: Army damage amplifier for campaign progression

skills.name: Hydro Hammer
skills.description: Deals damage, stuns, and summons a guardian water elemental
skills.tips: Best Nature hero - use to control enemies and add summon damage

skills.name: Surge
skills.description: Normal attacks heal all allies
skills.tips: Makes Tidecaller a viable healer replacement in late game

skills.name: Evolve
skills.description: Normal attacks can hit an additional target
skills.tips: Increases damage output significantly in multi-target fights

skills.name: Ascend
skills.description: Deals damage, knocks enemies up, and summons Water Lord
skills.tips: Powerful crowd control and summon ultimate

skills.name: Purification Lance
skills.description: Deals damage and summons a ranged elemental
skills.tips: Additional summon for more sustained damage

skills.name: War Messenger
skills.description: Increases soldier attack per 1000 deployed
skills.tips: Boosts army damage - important for campaign progression

skills.name: Dark Healing
skills.description: Heals allies with dark magic
skills.tips: Primary healing ability for Horde teams

skills.name: Dread Golem
skills.description: Summons a powerful golem that fears enemies and deals damage
skills.tips: Offensive ultimate with CC - adds pressure while healing

skills.name: Curse Fire
skills.description: After Dark Healing, grants damage reduction and additional healing to allies
skills.tips: Follow-up buff to amplify healing effect

skills.name: Dark Magic Boost
skills.description: Boosts allies' attack and grants temporary stun immunity barrier
skills.tips: Offensive support - prevents CC while boosting damage

skills.name: Dark Magic Shield
skills.description: Provides passive defensive bonuses
skills.tips: Helps Witch survive to keep healing team

skills.name: Guardian Messenger
skills.description: Increases soldiers' HP per 1000 deployed
skills.tips: Makes your army tankier in campaign and guild events

skills.name: Guardian Discipline
skills.description: Deals damage, stuns enemies, grants damage reduction and control immunity to self
skills.tips: Aggressive tanking tool - control enemies while staying immune to CC

skills.name: Shield of Faith
skills.description: Summons massive shield that explodes for damage when it expires
skills.tips: Huge defensive cooldown that also punishes enemies

skills.name: Judgment
skills.description: Deals damage, stuns target, and heals self
skills.tips: Sustain and control in one ability

skills.name: Indomitable
skills.description: Grants damage reduction to all allies
skills.tips: Team-wide defensive buff - makes entire lineup tankier

skills.name: Eternal
skills.description: HP cannot drop below 1 when near death - grants brief invincibility
skills.tips: Near-immortal mechanic - known for soaking lethal boss damage

skills.name: Order of Sanctity
skills.description: Additional defensive bonuses for League team
skills.tips: Further enhances League survivability

skills.name: Fortified Defense
skills.description: Grants a shield that absorbs incoming damage
skills.tips: Use proactively to mitigate burst damage from enemy abilities

skills.name: Insatiable Hunger
skills.description: Increases HP and Attack stats
skills.tips: Makes Barbarian tankier and adds some offensive pressure

skills.name: Horde Defender
skills.description: Increases damage reduction for all Horde heroes in the queue
skills.tips: Core Horde tank - his presence makes entire Horde team tankier

skills.name: Savage Strike
skills.description: Deals damage and stuns enemies
skills.tips: Crowd control tool to lock down priority targets

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: Forces enemies to attack Barbarian instead of allies
skills.tips: Protect your damage dealers by redirecting enemy focus

skills.name: Cheer
skills.description: Increases movement and attack speed of allies; may also deal damage
skills.tips: Core buff ability - speeds up entire team

skills.name: Endgame Serenade
skills.description: Reduces allies' skill cooldowns after using Resonant Chord
skills.tips: CDR mechanic - allows team to cast abilities more frequently

skills.name: Fight Song
skills.description: Increases crit rate for all League heroes
skills.tips: Team-wide crit buff for League comps

skills.name: Resonant Chord
skills.description: Deals massive damage and stuns enemies
skills.tips: High impact ultimate - AOE damage and CC

skills.name: Grace
skills.description: Increases allies' crit rate; may also deal damage
skills.tips: Another crit boost - stacks with Fight Song

skills.name: Baa-Baa Charge
skills.description: Summons sheep that deal damage and stun enemies
skills.tips: Adorable but deadly - provides CC and damage

skills.name: Sheepherd
skills.description: Summons a powerful lamb to fight for the team
skills.tips: Core summon ability - adds sustained damage

skills.name: Song of Life
skills.description: When units die or are sacrificed, all heroes recover HP
skills.tips: Turns summon deaths into healing - synergy with sacrifice mechanics

skills.name: Forest Lullaby
skills.description: Was previously 'Shepherd's Bell' - grants damage reduction to nearby allies
skills.tips: Team defensive buff

skills.name: Revenge
skills.description: Each time a unit dies or is sacrificed, all heroes gain permanent damage increase
skills.tips: Snowball mechanic - team gets stronger as summons die

skills.name: Blessing of Spring
skills.description: Additional supportive bonuses for Nature team
skills.tips: Further enhances Nature synergies

skills.name: Therapy
skills.description: Heals single ally with lowest HP and increases healing received
skills.tips: Primary single-target heal - focus heals where needed most

skills.name: Radiant Song
skills.description: Increases max HP and grants final damage reduction temporarily to all allies
skills.tips: Powerful defensive ultimate for surviving burst damage

skills.name: Prayer of Healing
skills.description: Heals all allies at once
skills.tips: AOE heal for sustained team recovery

skills.name: Holy Grace
skills.description: Grants self damage reduction
skills.tips: Makes Nun harder to kill - essential for healer survival

skills.name: Sacred Union
skills.description: Increases max HP of all League heroes
skills.tips: Team-wide HP boost makes entire League lineup tankier

skills.name: Root Absorption
skills.description: Summons roots that deal damage and steal attack from enemies
skills.tips: Debuffs enemy damage while boosting your team's attack

skills.name: Sunflower Core
skills.description: Summons a powerful core that damages and stuns all enemies
skills.tips: Strong AOE stun - combo with Tidecaller for maximum control

skills.name: Phantom Pollen
skills.description: Reduces enemy hit rate and deals damage over time
skills.tips: Was previously called 'Bewildering Powder' - makes enemies miss attacks

skills.name: Forest Ally
skills.description: Each dead or sacrificed unit reduces Sunflower Core cooldown
skills.tips: Synergizes with summon-heavy Nature comps for faster ultimates

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Increases defensive stats
skills.tips: Provides survivability for a damage dealer

skills.name: Nature's Harmony
skills.description: Gains damage reduction for each living Nature hero
skills.tips: Becomes tankier in pure Nature teams - synergy with Monk

skills.name: Detonate
skills.description: Deals damage and applies burn status effect to enemies
skills.tips: Apply burn first, then use other heroes who gain bonus damage vs burned targets

skills.name: Skyfire
skills.description: Massive area damage dealing multiple hits to all enemies
skills.tips: High burst AOE damage - excellent for clearing enemy teams

skills.name: Flame Shield
skills.description: Provides shield to self and damages nearby enemies
skills.tips: Use defensively when focused or offensively to increase DPS

skills.name: Elemental Mastery
skills.description: Increases all skill damage output
skills.tips: Core passive that amplifies all of Pyromancer's abilities

skills.name: Ember
skills.description: Grants attack boost when HP drops below threshold
skills.tips: Pyromancer becomes more dangerous when low on health

skills.name: Burst Rune
skills.description: Further enhances burst damage from skills
skills.tips: Makes Pyromancer's combo damage extremely high

skills.name: Arcane Shield
skills.description: Increases damage reduction and removes debuffs from self
skills.tips: Cleanse and defensive buff - essential for survivability

skills.name: Forbidden Realm
skills.description: Silences all enemies and deals damage
skills.tips: AOE silence - shuts down enemy abilities completely

skills.name: Spell Reflection
skills.description: Deals damage and grants brief immunity to incoming abilities
skills.tips: Counter enemy skills - timing is critical

skills.name: Arcane Link
skills.description: Increases max HP
skills.tips: More HP for better tanking

skills.name: Arcane Guardian
skills.description: Grants damage-absorbing shield periodically
skills.tips: Passive shield generation for sustained tankiness

skills.name: Healing Breeze
skills.description: Heals the ally with the lowest HP
skills.tips: Prioritizes critical healing automatically

skills.name: Rain Blessing
skills.description: Increases the healing effect of all allies
skills.tips: Amplifies all healing in your team, not just Shaman's

skills.name: Wolf Soul
skills.description: Summons 2 wolves to fight alongside team
skills.tips: Free summons for additional damage and tanking

skills.name: Restorative Totem
skills.description: Summons a healing totem that continuously restores HP
skills.tips: Provides sustained AOE healing over time

skills.name: Ancestor's Soul
skills.description: Possesses the ally with lowest HP, preventing their death
skills.tips: Life-saving ultimate - can turn fights by preventing key hero deaths

skills.name: Soul Link
skills.description: Links with an ally to share damage and becomes immune to part of it
skills.tips: Core mechanic - absorbs team damage at reduced rate. Deploy mid or front

skills.name: Soul Empowerment
skills.description: Increases HP of all Horde heroes in the queue
skills.tips: Team-wide HP boost for Horde comps

skills.name: Pain Diffusion
skills.description: Triggers Soul Freeze automatically when HP falls below threshold
skills.tips: Defensive trigger for survivability

skills.name: Soul Recall
skills.description: Upon near-death, deals AOE damage and cannot die for a duration
skills.tips: Resurrection mechanic with damage - turns death into offensive tool

skills.name: Soul Freeze
skills.description: Deals damage and may freeze the target
skills.tips: CC tool with damage component

skills.name: Whirlwind
skills.description: Attacks all surrounding enemies with spinning blade attack
skills.tips: AOE damage for frontline pressure

skills.name: Blade Storm
skills.description: Massive spinning attack dealing heavy damage to all nearby enemies
skills.tips: High damage AOE ultimate - position in middle of enemy formation

skills.name: Crazy Cut
skills.description: Deals damage and gains damage reduction temporarily
skills.tips: Offensive skill with defensive benefit - use aggressively

skills.name: Battle Will
skills.description: Prevents death once by staying at 1 HP for a short time
skills.tips: Second chance mechanic - allows clutch plays and comebacks

skills.name: Suppression
skills.description: Increases damage based on missing HP
skills.tips: Becomes more dangerous when low on health - high risk/reward

skills.name: Growth
skills.description: Increases max HP, reduces damage taken, and heals self
skills.tips: Core tanking ability - stacks survivability bonuses

skills.name: Timber Shell
skills.description: Increases damage reduction and max HP, and provides healing
skills.tips: Passive sustain makes Treeguard extremely durable

skills.name: Vine
skills.description: While Growth is active, attacks deal extra damage and apply poison
skills.tips: Offensive pressure while in defensive stance

skills.name: Titanwood Assault
skills.description: Summons thorns that deal damage and heal Treeguard
skills.tips: Offensive ultimate with self-healing

skills.name: Vitality Surge
skills.description: Increases damage output and heals self
skills.tips: Hybrid offense/defense ability

skills.name: Whispered Shadows
skills.description: Deals damage to enemies and heals allies simultaneously
skills.tips: Hybrid support - damages and heals at same time

skills.name: Shadow Rite
skills.description: Increases HP of all Horde heroes
skills.tips: Makes entire Horde team tankier - essential team buff

skills.name: Malicious Passion
skills.description: Increases damage of allied Horde heroes
skills.tips: Key damage amplifier for pure Horde compositions

skills.name: Debilitation
skills.description: Reduces enemies' skill damage and damage reduction
skills.tips: Powerful debuff that makes enemies more vulnerable

skills.name: Bloodlust
skills.description: Grants HP drain to self and boosts allies' attack speed
skills.tips: Team-wide attack speed buff with self-sustain

skills.name: Barb
skills.description: Increases normal attack count and applies bleeding effect
skills.tips: Core passive - boosts basic attack frequency and adds DOT

skills.name: Fatal Preyer
skills.description: Was previously 'Fatal Prayer' - deals damage, knocks back enemies, increases attack
skills.tips: High damage ultimate with self-buff

skills.name: Hunter
skills.description: Increases attack stat
skills.tips: Simple but effective damage amplifier

skills.name: Tradition
skills.description: Increases damage of Horde heroes in the queue
skills.tips: Team-wide Horde damage buff

skills.name: Impulse Instinct
skills.description: Increases attack speed
skills.tips: Synergizes with Barb for more attacks and bleeding procs
